1.「キハダさんっ。まだ 間に合います。| やめるなんて言わずに もう一度| 考え直: Yellowfin tuna. It's not too late. Don't say|you're quitting. Think again!

2.「げーっ また来たのかよ アンタ……。| うるせえなぁ。おれっちは| もう 木工: Geez, you're here again, aren't you? Shut|up. I don't want to be a woodworker anymore!

3.「郷里のお母さまが ご病気で| お金が必要だったのは わかります……。: I understand that your mother back home was|ill and needed money.

4.「でも うちに入門するとき 世界一の| 木工職人になって お城に 家具を献上する:
But when you first came to us, you said your|dream was to become the world's best|woodworker and present furniture to the|
|castle!

5.「よう 邪魔するぜ キハダさん。| 金が返せねぇなら もういいかげん| こっちに: Hey, Kiha, you're in my way. If you can't|return the money, then let's just leave the|body here.

6.「うっ！ デュバルさん……。| わかりました……。今 行きます。: Ugh! Mr. Duval. Yes, ma'am. I'm coming.

7.「待って！ あなたたちは どなたです？| うちの職人を どこへ連れていく気ですか: Wait! Who are you people? Where are you|taking our craftsmen?

8.「もう いいんだ カンナさん……。| 夢じゃ 食っていけねぇんだ。: It's okay, Kanna. I can't live on dreams.

9.「ごちゃごちゃ言ってねーで 早く来い！| テメーらみたいな カビくせぇ木工職人じ: Stop messing around and get your ass over|here! A moldy woodworker like you can't even|pay the interest!

11.「カビくさい……だと？| ちょっと 聞き捨てならない言葉だね！！: Smells musty... You think? That's a little|harsh, isn't it?

12.「……アタシは 素材にも 道具にも| カビなんて生やさせたこたぁ ありゃしないよ: ... I would never allow mold to grow on my|materials or tools! I'm proud to be a|craftsman!

13.「アンタらこそ 今 自分のやってることに| 誇りが あるってのかい！？| 胸張っ: Are you proud of what you are doing? Are you|doing your job with pride? What?

14.「キハダ！ アンタもアンタだよ！| 借金が苦しいからって 一度抱いた夢を| 捨て: Kijada! You're just like you! You're such a|pathetic man to throw away a dream you once|had just because you're in debt!

16.「ちょ……ちょっと アニキ！| ツバクロのアニキ～！！: Hey... Hey, Big brother! Tsubakuro no|Aniki~!

17.「なんじゃ 騒がしいのぅ。| オメーらで ちーたぁ片付けぇや……。: What's with all the racket? Clean up your|own mess.

18.「ん んん！？| ……もしや お嬢？ お嬢じゃろか？: Hm-hm! ... Miss? Is it the young lady?

19.「おや 誰かと思ったら ツバクロじゃないか。| ひさしぶりだね。: Well, look who's here. It's Tsubakuro. Hi.

20.「フン……。一文無しで じいさんに拾われて| ギルドの 使い走りしてたアンタが: Hmm. You were broke and ran errands for my|grandpa's guild, and now you're running a|stupid business with a big face.

21.「まぁいいさ。アンタなら 話が早いよ。| これ 受け取ってくんな！ その代わり|: Oh, my God. You're the one I want to talk|to. Don't take this! In exchange, you clear|Kijada's debt.

22.「こ……こりゃ スミツボのオヤジさんが| 大事にしとった 家宝の木工刀じゃろ！？: This... This must be the heirloom wooden|sword that Sumitsubo's father treasured! I|can't accept such a precious thing!

23.「今のアタシにとって 門弟よか| 大事なモンなんて ないんでね。| じいさんも: There's nothing more important to me right|now than my students. I'm sure your|grandfather will understand.

25.「まったく お嬢には かなわんのぉ。| ……ほいじゃ こりゃあ| わしが いっと: You're no match for the little girl. ...|Well, then, I'll leave you to it for the|time being.

27.「キハダ！ そこの <pc>だって| イチから コツコツ がんばってんだよ。: Yellowfin! Even the <pc> there|is from scratch.

28.「もう <color_yellow><%sEV_SYOK_HOSI><color: 003 mm (one-thousandth of a sun)<color_yellow><%sEV_SYOK_HOSI><color_white>I have grown up to be able to make more than|<%sev_syok_item>. You too, start working|hard tomorrow!

29.「お嬢……。まるで スミツボのオヤジさんが| 生き返ったかのようじゃったわ……。: Miss. It's as if old man Smithboro has come|back from the dead.

30.「キハダさん。アンタのこたぁ 目をつむるけぇ| 木工ギルドで働ける 幸せをかみし: Kiha. I'll close my eyes to you... and enjoy|the happiness of working for the|Woodworkers' Guild.
